summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) regarding a Southern District of New York (SDNY) grand jury subpoena dated July 5, 2019. The AUSA is on vacation until August 12, 2019, and directs urgent matters to other AUSAs on the case.

persons.name: To: 'SI < IMIIM>
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of the email, but the name is partially obscured or formatted in a non-standard way.

events.title: SDNY Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued by the Southern District of New York.

events.title: AUSA Out of Office
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends an automatic reply stating they are on vacation until August 12, 2019.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic email reply from an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) involved in the SDNY Epstein case.
It references a Southern District of New York grand jury subpoena dated July 5, 2019, indicating active grand jury proceedings in the Epstein investigation at that time.
The AUSA was on vacation from August 3 to August 12, 2019, and directed urgent matters to other AUSAs on the case.
